reference.shortdesc: A feature number is the number that is associated with a product feature.

example.title: Example

draft-comment.author: Kristen J Eberlein
draft-comment.p: Do we want to simply cross reference the example in the prodinfo topic? This question probably applies to all the other elements that can only be used as children of prodinfo.

example.p: The following code sample shows that the topic is associated with feature number 135 of the product MyController:
